channel.title: Webclient laggs. Any help?
channel.description:
So basically my wbesite maker is through Wix.com and was wondering what my webclient is doing wrong that it shouldnt. It's producing mad lagg on the users side when he loggs on. Heres my webclient html code. [code]<html> <body> <body bgcolor="black"> <title>Tellerium's Webclient</title> <applet name=client width=100% height=100% archive='https://dl.dropbox.com/s/g7t7jiz6ta8bwsy/Tellerium.jar' code='Loader.class'> </applet> </body> </html>[/code]
Any ideas?

item.title: Webclient laggs. Any help?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Seems like its a server sided issue where the server sends all the data to the client to load correctly upon login.

Read full topic

item.title: Webclient laggs. Any help?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

This is more of a problem with your host. Make your own website and use your webclient there.
Also, if you aren’t on a VPS, that might be a contributing factor.

Read full topic
